DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if treatment with Xionix will improve wound healing for patients with pyoderma gangrenosum.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Open Label Study of Xilonix in Subjects With Pyoderma Gangrenosum
